short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly Convert any images to any different formats (PNG, JPG, HEIC, WEBP...) with just a right-click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert images effortlessly with Right Click Image Converter, the ultimate tool for transforming images in various formats right from your browser. Whether it’s converting from HEIC, AVIF, WEBP, JFIF, or other popular formats, this extension integrates seamlessly into your workflow. Just right-click any image on any website, choose the format, and let the extension handle the conversion instantly!

Key Features:

*Wide Format Support: Convert images to and from popular formats such as PNG, JPEG, WEBP, HEIC, AVIF, BMP, JFIF, and more.

*Fast and Easy: With just one right-click, convert any image directly from the context menu—no additional software required.

*Batch Processing: Convert multiple images simultaneously, saving time and effort.
Customizable Settings: Choose your preferred output formats and download locations via the options menu for a tailored experience.

*Seamless Browsing Integration: Works on any website, allowing you to convert images as you browse with no disruption.

*Performance Optimized: Lightweight and fast, delivering quick conversions without slowing down your browsing.

Whether you’re a professional dealing with various image formats or just need quick image conversions while browsing, Right Click Image Converter simplifies the process. Say goodbye to complicated software and experience fast, versatile conversions, including support for newer formats like HEIC and AVIF.

Permission Justification:

  *contextMenus: Allows the extension to add the "Convert to" options to the right-  click context menu, enabling image conversion.
  *activeTab: Grants the extension permission to interact with the currently active tab to fetch and convert the selected image.
  *<all_urls>: Required to access and convert images from any website you visit.
